body: Vincent does not understand why Rwandan president Paul Kagame is invited to Denver Leadership Conference: "Paul Kagame is responsable, according to several UN reports, of plundering the congo, supporting armed rebels inside the Congo, crimes against humanity and possibly genocide on an immensely large scale."
original_body: Vincent does not understand why Rwandan president Paul Kagame is invited to Denver Leadership Conference: "Paul Kagame is responsable, according to several UN reports, of plundering the congo, supporting armed rebels inside the Congo, crimes against humanity and possibly genocide on an immensely large scale."
title: Rwanda: Is it Denver Dictatorship Conference?
